citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The current approved environmental enhancement plan does not address special consideration for infants and young
juveniles. There is an approved SOP that does address hand rearing /fostering of infants when necessary but it is not a
part of the written plan.
One section of the plan requires that certain non human primates including infants be provided special attention in
accordance with the instructions of the attending veterinarian. The written plan must be amended to include the special
considerations of infants . CORRECT BY : 7/22/2023
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility employees.
Additional Inspectors:
Gervais Edmonds-Wiggins, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER
Colette Kirk El-Amin, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
3.81(c)(1) 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The current approved environmental enhancement plan does not address special consideration for infants and young 
juveniles. There is an approved SOP that does address hand rearing /fostering of infants when necessary but it is not a 
part of the written plan.  
One section of the plan requires that certain non human primates including infants be provided special attention in 
accordance with the instructions of the attending veterinarian. The written plan must be amended to include the special 
considerations of infants . CORRECT BY : 7/22/2023 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility employees. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Gervais Edmonds-Wiggins, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER 
Colette Kirk El-Amin, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
